forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night drapes its dark shawl over downtown San Francisco, the air feels crisp and invigorating. The city lies mostly clear under the stars, a low around 46 offering a refreshing respite from the usual rush. Tomorrow, the sun will weave a tapestry of partly sunny skies, with a daytime high lingering near 57, the coolness whispering of the more vibrant winter days to come. However, the afternoon might bring a slight chill, as the temperature settles to around 54, caressed by a gentle northwest wind.

The absence of fog creates a pristine atmosphere perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to an artisanal café, where one can savor a warm drink while gazing out at the expansive bay. In terms of attire, layering is key; a light sweater or jacket will provide comfort against the cool breeze as one meanders through the picturesque streets. As the city comes to life, consider charting a course to one of the local galleries or shops, where the artistry of San Francisco unfolds, inviting exploration and a moment’s pause amidst the bustle of everyday life.
